value:
I hope I'll be able to play my role
convincingly. I must admit, even just
wearing the outfit makes me nervous.

What does marriage mean to you?
To me, it represents becoming
family with someone you love.

Where was it I read that governing
a family is just as much trouble as
managing an entire kingdom? Hmm...

What kind of person do you want to
be with? Maybe it's unfair of me to
ask—I'm not sure of my own answer.

Chrom's wedding was magnificent.
I'll carry the memory of the happy
couple's joy for the rest of my life.

Hello, I'm Robin. I bring you tidings
from—wait, I'm still dressed for a
wedding, aren't I? Well, too late now.

That went well! I hope my wedding
vows will be as joyous an occasion.

Weddings and battles have a lot in
common. Each requires careful
planning to avoid it all going wrong.

These clothes represent something
important. I shouldn't sully them with
this kind of performance...

Oh, wow. Someone's getting into the
spirit of the reception!

I'm Robin, a tactician of Ylisse. I know
I'm to play the role of groom, but...
Who am I supposed to be marrying?

I know this is the idea, but seeing all
these lovely people in wedding attire
makes me think of getting married.$k$pMaybe Askr will be where I find the
one to spend my life with. What do
you think, $Nu?$k$pAh, that's right. You did mention that
you aren't originally from here either.
I guess we have that in common.$k$pThere must be people from your
homeland you miss. Loved ones
you feel lonely to be without...$k$pSorry—I don't mean to pry, or bring
down the mood. Still, it won't do for
you to be lonely at a festival like this.$k$pWell, as long as I'm here, I promise
you won't be. Here, take my hand.
Let's go enjoy the festivities together.
Take my hand.
I pledge my love!
Together forever.
Rely on me.
Looking bad…
I know it's only for fun, but dressing up like a groom still gives me butterflies in my stomach.
*start* Hey, don't do that! I'm nervous enough as it is!
There's no greater joy than spending your days with the one you love.
Hah! You should have seen Chrom's wedding.
The brides' dresses are like flowers in bloom. Everyone looks incredible!
I'd like to find someone to spend the rest of my life with.
You have so many people close to you. I must say, I envy them.
Let's be off.
Nervous?
Shall we?
